greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array read by falling antidiagonals: T(n,k) is the number of connected directed multigraphs with loops with n arcs and at most k vertices.
comment: Partial sums of the rows of A139621, i.e., T(n,k) = sum(A139621(n,p),p=0..k).
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1325
results.author: _Benoit Jubin_, May 06 2008
ext: Name edited by _M. F. Hasler_, Jul 31 2017
Terms a(32) and beyond from _Andrew Howroyd_, Oct 22 2019
